titleStmt.title: An expedient to extricate one's self out of the guilt of schism, and enter effectually into a virtual catholick communion, without participation in any corruptions, notwithstanding any unreasonable terms of communion, which might otherwise keep him out. In a letter to a friend.
titleStmt.author: Stephens, Edward, d. 1706.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Edward Stephens by Wing.
Date of publication suggested by Wing.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
